name: Were the Wolf Wonders
description:
You play as Red in this short 2D Platformer. But be careful as when the moon comes out, you turn into a Wolf. 

Fight various woodland enemies such as mushrooms and trolls to make your way to Grandma's house.

Will you go to Grandma's as a Wolf or as Red? Your choice determines your fate.

Created at Atlantic Game Jam 2022 in 48 hrs by Pixels Grimm (Team #1)
